ComicInfo.Summary:
The Hills Are Alive With the Sound of Mayhem!: Thunderbolt Ross recruits Multiple Man and Radioactive Man to bring in Bruce Banner who is hiding out in the Rocky Mountains with Rick Jones and monkey. When Radioactive Man bucks the plan and starts wailing on the Hulk, the jade giant ends up having to save Ross from his villainous ally. When Multiple Man sees that the Hulk is acting like a hero, he allows him to escape capture.
Untitled: The Human Torch makes a bid for becoming an Avenger but cannot handle the friendly ribbing he receives from the official members.
